content.value_statement: React Native apps often suffer from scroll jank, unnecessary re-renders, and slow list performance. This skill provides proven patterns for FlatList optimization, memoization, and state management that eliminate performance bottlenecks.
actual_capabilities: Optimize FlatList with keyExtractor, getItemLayout, and memoized renderItem
Apply React.memo and useCallback to prevent unnecessary component re-renders
Use Zustand selectors to minimize store subscription re-renders
Optimize images with expo-image caching and priority loading
Debug re-renders using React DevTools Profiler and why-did-you-render
limitations: Does not modify your codebase automatically - provides patterns you apply manually
Requires React Native or Expo project to use the patterns
Does not include runtime performance monitoring or profiling tools

use_cases.title: Fix Scroll Jank
use_cases.description: Optimize FlatList performance in React Native apps experiencing frame drops during scrolling.

use_cases.title: Reduce Re-renders
use_cases.description: Implement memoization patterns to prevent unnecessary component updates and improve UI responsiveness.

use_cases.title: Optimize Image Loading
use_cases.description: Configure expo-image with caching and priority loading for smoother image display in lists.

prompt_templates.title: FlatList Basics
prompt_templates.scenario: Optimize a list that scrolls poorly
prompt_templates.prompt: My React Native FlatList is scrolling slowly. Show me how to add keyExtractor with useCallback, getItemLayout for fixed-height items, and memoize the renderItem function.

prompt_templates.title: Memoization Deep Dive
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me apply React.memo and useCallback to a list item component. Show me how to create a stable callback and use shallow comparison for complex props.

prompt_templates.title: State Management
prompt_templates.prompt: My Zustand store is causing all components to re-render when any state changes. Show me how to use selectors with useShallow to only re-render when specific values change.

prompt_templates.title: Performance Debugging
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me set up why-did-you-render in my React Native project and use the React DevTools Profiler to identify which components are rendering unnecessarily.

output_examples.input: My FlatList with 1000 items scrolls poorly and causes jank
output: Add keyExtractor with useCallback for stable keys
Use getItemLayout for fixed-height items to skip measurement
Enable removeClippedSubviews to unmount off-screen items
Consider FlashList for lists over 1000 items

output_examples.input: How do I prevent unnecessary re-renders in my list items
output: Wrap list item components with React.memo
Use useCallback for any callbacks passed as props
Avoid passing new object references as props
Use shallow comparison for complex prop objects
Keep dependency arrays minimal and stable

output_examples.input: My Zustand store causes global re-renders
output: Replace whole-store selection with specific selectors
Use useShallow from zustand/react for multiple values
Subscribe only to the state values your component needs
Split stores by domain to reduce re-render scope

best_practices: Always wrap FlatList renderItem with useCallback to prevent new function references on each render
Use getItemLayout for lists with fixed-height items to eliminate measurement overhead
Apply shallow selectors in Zustand to subscribe only to the specific state values your component needs
anti_patterns: Using inline arrow functions for keyExtractor or renderItem (creates new functions every render)
Selecting the entire Zustand store instead of specific selectors (causes global re-renders)
Memoizing simple primitive prop access where overhead exceeds benefit

faq.question: Does this skill work with Expo Go?
faq.answer: Yes. All patterns work in Expo Go including FlatList optimizations, memoization, and expo-image.

faq.question: How many items before I need FlashList instead of FlatList?
faq.answer: Consider FlashList for lists over 1000 items or when FlatList still janks after optimization.

faq.question: Can I use these patterns with React Navigation?
faq.answer: Yes. Use useCallback for navigation callbacks and memoize screen components to prevent re-renders.

faq.question: Does this skill modify my project files?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides patterns and code examples. You apply them to your codebase manually.

faq.question: Why is my memoized component still re-rendering?
faq.answer: Check that props are stable (use useCallback for functions, useMemo for objects). Also verify parent re-renders.

faq.question: How is this different from React Native Performance Monitor?
faq.answer: This skill provides optimization patterns. Performance Monitor shows frame rates in real-time during development.
